My opinion... Would the player enjoy such a game? The answer is the same to any question about *any* game idea: if it's done well with purposeful design to make it enjoyable, then it will be enjoyed at least by some.

A concept in and of itself (and we all have many flying around in our heads all the time) is not enough to tell. So... make it and make it well, whatever you're going to do, and it will be appreciated. But make it poorly, and, no, people won't. There's no guarantee just based on a pie-in-the-sky concept. It's up to you to make it so.

People get enamored with ideas. In the end, really, the idea is inconsequential. It's what you do with it that matters,
